scripts.build: next build && cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/apps/lang-learn/.next/ && cp -r public .next/standalone/apps/lang-learn/ && docker build -t lang-learn .
scripts.build-test: next build && cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/apps/lang-learn/.next/ && cp -r public .next/standalone/apps/lang-learn/ && docker build -t lang-learn:test .
scripts.build-staging: next build && cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/apps/lang-learn/.next/ && cp -r public .next/standalone/apps/lang-learn/ && docker build -t lang-learn:staging .
